TopLevelDiagram Properties

Requires: VI Scripting

Inherits from AbstractDiagram»Diagram. View the class hierarchy.

PropertyDescription
Button Bar VisibleShows or hides the button bar on the block diagram. Details
Execution Highlighted ObjectReturns a reference to the execution highlighted object. Details
Highlight Execution?Enables or disables execution highlighting on the block diagram. Details
Menubar VisibleShows or hides the menubar on the block diagram. Details
Selection List[]Array of references to the selected objects in the diagram. Details
